page.title: 10EDUCATION, COMPREHENSIVE.
page.content: EDUCATION; COMPREHENSIVE. {The Woodlands Comprehensive School,Broad Lane, Coventry is a school for 11 to 18 year old boys.It was built in 1965 to educate boys of all abilities.Its catchment area includes Eastern Green & extends towards the city.It has a 10 form entry, and is organized on a house system. In 1984 the Coventry City Council were asked by central government to seek ways of making economies. As part of the proposed economies certain schools were to be reorganized,The Woodlands to become a co-educational, from Sep. 1986. In May 1985 after public & council debate it was decided that it should remain the only all boys secondary school in Coventry.In June '85,there are 1556 pupils in 48 forms(125,6th.form) 91 teaching staff & one Headteacher.
